name: Garrison
description: A fortified site for soldiers and defense; adventurers could obtain contracts, enlist aid, or break in to free captives.
atmosphere: The garrison has an imposing, military atmosphere with the sound of training drills and the clatter of weapons. The air carries the scent of leather, steel, and the metallic tang of discipline. The atmosphere crackles with the energy of military readiness and the constant preparation for battle.
